entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:08 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -29.2°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -32.6°C
Wind: SSW 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 37 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 56 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:50 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
